summary: Here’s the article.  Redshirts clocks in at number 73, which is low for the list, but high in terms of the total number of all science fiction books ever written in the history of the world.  It’s kind of like being #380 on the Forbes list of the 400 richest people in the world: you’re […]
title: Redshirts on Esquire’s “75 Best Sci-Fi Books of All Time” List
